page.title: 09LOCAL HOUSING RAVENGLASS
page.content: 64 households in the area were asked to fill in a questionnaire about their houses. Type:- 32{terraced,}17{detached,}5 {farm,}5{semi-detached,}4{flats,}1 {bungalow. Building materials:-{stone}(beach cobbles or local granite)45,{brick or {breeze block}18,{wood}1. House age:between{0-5yrs}12,{5-50yrs} 5,{50-100yrs}6, over{100yrs}41. Water supply: -{mains}62,{springs}2. Heating:{gas}1{elect}15{oil}6{coal}32. Cooking:{gas}1{elect}46{oil}2{coal}4. All are on the main{electricity supply 57 have{telephones. Cars:-{2 or more cars}-24%,{1car}-56%, {no car}-20%. Ownership:-61.5%{owner-occupied,}23% {rented,}15.5%{holiday homes. 5 households provide bed and breakfast accommodation.
